name: studyid
label: Study ID
description: MIABIS-2.0-01 (The unique ID or acronym of the study)

name: name
label: Name
description: MIABIS-2.0-02 (The name of the study in English)

name: description
label: Description
description: MIABIS-2.0-08 (A description of the study aim. Recommendation max. 2000 char.)

name: principalinvestigator
label: Principal Investigator
description: MIABIS-2.0-18 (The name of the person responsible for the study e.g. the principal investigator)

name: contactinformation
label: Contact information
description: MIABIS-2.0-07 (Contact information for the contact person of the study MIABIS-2.0-07 and MIABIS-2.0-23)

name: studydesign
label: Study design
description: MIABIS-2.0-19 (The design of the study. Can be one or several values: MIABIS-2.0-19)

name: containspersonal
label: Contains Personal records
description: Reference to Personal records that are grouped together by this Study
